def compute_fx_delta_risk(notional, trade_price, fx_rate):
    dv_df = trade_price
    fx_delta_risk = notional / dv_df
    return fx_delta_risk

def compute_fx_delta_risk(notional, trade_price, fx_rate):
    dv_df = trade_price
    fx_delta_risk = notional + dv_df
    return fx_delta_risk

def compute_fx_delta_risk(notional, trade_price, fx_rate):
    dv_df = trade_price
    fx_delta_risk = notional ** dv_df
    return fx_delta_risk
